pr_title: GEODE-8326: remove 5 minutes wait to get stack dump

timeline.message: GEODE-8326: remove 5 minutes wait to get stack dump
Increase the wait time so that stack dump can be triggered.

timeline.bodyText: 5 hours is a long time...Will this change going to be merged to develop? Can the debug be tried with local/private build?
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: It is not reproducible in private/local build. We only need to have it to fail once, once the stack dump is triggered, we can/should change it back to default timeout.
replies.author: pivotal-eshu

replies.bodyText: seems like this experiment could have been conducted in the PR pipeline, shouldn't have needed to merge to develop
replies.author: onichols-pivotal
